        And save into the file

        Old, not use now

        返回:

      • passThroughThisStation

        public int passThroughThisStation(java.lang.String station)
        Determine whether the journey pass through a station.
        参数:
        station - the query station
        返回:
        If pass through this station, return the arrival time.

        If not, return -1

      • fromFirstToSecond

        public int fromFirstToSecond(java.lang.String station1,
                    java.lang.String station2)
        Determine whether the journey go from first station to the second station.
        参数:
        station1 - First station
        station2 - Second station
        返回:
        If the journey go from the first to the second, return 1

        If not, return -1

      • deleteTrain

        public void deleteTrain()
        Delete all the file of this journey

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:

        返回:
